Chap. 27 - The Character of the Law of God
[THIS ARTICLE
APPEARED IN THE SIGNS OF THE
TIMES, APRIL 15, 1886.]

     David says: "The law of the Lord is perfect" (Psalm 19:7). "Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever" (Psalm 119:152). And Paul testifies: "The law is holy, and the commandment holy, and just, and good" (Romans 7:12).
